oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ...The Anteater then lays down the law with regard to the proper food for different animals, and that their marriages should be suitable. They all listen to the Anteater, and also to the Lynx, who repeats to them the Anteaters words... she again proceeds to deliver to the Lynx her important messages concerning the nature and habits of the different animals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Anteater's laws (||kabbo's version 2)
